thread.title: Catherine Booth
thread.title_full: The Flights Guru reviewed by Catherine Booth

author: Catherine Booth
title: Catherine Booth
text: As this was my first time booking flights myself, I was nervous as to what to expect, however, Jacob was very calming and reassuring when i said I was worried. I want to thank him for all his help and I will definitely recommend his service to my friends.
